math.challenging_bot: It's not possible to challenge a bot
math.timeout: Time's up! {mention} did not answer in time.
math.wrong_value: {mention}, you're wrong! The correct answer is {answer}.
math.invalid_value: {mention}, that's not a valid value! The correct answer is {answer}.
math.not_target_answering: {mention} tried to answer, but they're not the one being challenged. Another loss for them!
math.square_question: What is the {operation} of a square with side length {side}?
math.rectangle_question: What is the {operation} of a rectangle with length {length} and width {width}?
math.triangle_question: What is the area of a triangle with base {base} and height {height}?
math.pentagon_question: What is the perimeter of a regular pentagon with side length {length}?
math.trapezoid_question: What is the area of a trapezoid with bases {base} and {base2} with height {height}?

balance.description: Displays the coin balance of a user

give.giving_money_to_self: You cannot transfer funds to yourself.
give.insufficient_coins: You have {coins} coins; you cannot transfer more than your balance.

leaderboard.description: Displays the top 10 users by coin balance
leaderboard.title: Top 10 users by coin balance

shop.title: Shop — use o!shop buy <item> [amount] to purchase items

coinflip.description: Choose heads, tails, or side. Side has a 1/6000 chance and multiplies winnings by 5000x.
coinflip.no_choice: Please choose 'heads', 'tails', or 'side' and specify a bet amount.
coinflip.insufficient_coins: You have {coins} coins; you cannot wager more than your balance.
coinflip.wrong_choice: Valid options: HEADS, TAILS, and SIDE.
coinflip.side_really_close: It appeared to land on Side, but did not.

russianroulette.warning:
**Russian Roulette**
• 5/6 chance: your balance is multiplied by **1.25x**
• 1/6 chance: you lose **ALL MONEY.**
Type `o!russianroulette yes` to proceed or `o!russianroulette no` to cancel.
russianroulette.multiplayer_warning:
{mentions}, {author_mention} is inviting you to a Russian Roulette game. Rules:
**Russian Roulette**
• 5/6 chance: your balance is multiplied by **1.25x**
• 1/6 chance: you lose **ALL MONEY.**
• If a real player loses, each remaining player receives 1/6 of their coins.
Reply with the avatar you wish to use, or `no` to cancel.
russianroulette.invite_timeout: {mention} did not respond in time and will not go bankrupt!
russianroulette.already_taken: {mention, that one is already taken! Pick another.
russianroulette.fail_due_already_taken: {mention} did not pick a valid avatar. They will not join in the roulette.
russianroulette.non_existent_mfw: {mention}, that avatar doesn't exist. Input a valid one.
russianroulette.fail_due_non_existent_mfw: {mention} picked a non-existent avatar. They will not join in the roulette.

harvest.next_free_harvest: Your next free harvest is in {time}. Spend {coins} coins to get an extra harvest now? ({yes}/{no})
harvest.timeout: You are on cooldown. Try again later.
harvest.new_mfw: A new item was added to your collection.

reminder.invalid_choice: Use 'enable', 'disable', or 'none' to set this option.
reminder.ready: {mention}, your next free item is ready to be harvested!

inventory.description: View your or another user's items
inventory.title: {name}'s items

transfer.description: Transfer one or more items to another user
transfer.no_values: Specify items to transfer. Example: o!transfer @them 2 kfw, mfw, 3 wlw

sell.info: Sell your items. Example: o!sell 2 kfw, mfw, 3 wlw

selldupes.description: Automatically sell duplicate items. To exclude items, list them (e.g., o!autosell mfw).
selldupes.success: Done. Your new balance is {new_coins} {coin_icon}. (Earned {earned} {coin_icon} from selling duplicates.)
